thread.title: Pandora Reports Third-Quarter Sales That Miss Analysts' Views
thread.title_full: Pandora Reports Third-Quarter Sales That Miss Analysts' Views - Bloomberg Business

author: Lucas Shaw
title: Pandora Reports Third-Quarter Sales That Miss Analysts' Views
text:
Pandora Media Inc., the largest Internet radio service, reported third-quarter sales that missed analysts’ estimates. The shares fell.
Revenue rose 30 percent to $311.6 million, Oakland, California-based Pandora said Thursday in a statement. That compared with projections of $312.8 million, the average of 28 analysts’ estimates compiled by Bloomberg.
Listener hours totaled 5.14 billion, up 3 percent from a year earlier, Pandora said.
Pandora fell 9.3 percent to $17.40 in extended trading. The shares were little changed at $19.19 at the close in New York and have gained 7.6 percent this year.
